issue.title: polaris steering angle -> vehicle velocity bug

content.raw: I used a gas of 1 and hand brake of 0. The problem as outlined in my other post is that the vehicle is barely steerable because it's slipping the whole time ... unless you're driving very very slow maybe (haven't tried that yet).
content.html: I used a gas of 1 and hand brake of 0. The problem as outlined in my other post is that the vehicle is barely steerable because it's slipping the whole time ... unless you're driving very very slow maybe (haven't tried that yet).
